alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 6:28PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Owyhee County through 700 PM MDT... At 627 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Patlock Ranch, or 20 miles north of Owyhee, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Payne Creek Reservoir and Riddle around 650 PM MDT. Otter Reservoir, US Highway 51, Tindall Ranch and Grasmere around 700 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
